thread.title: Satisfied Client February 2017
thread.title_full: AnnuityAdvantage reviewed by Satisfied Client February 2017

author: Satisfied Client February 2017
title: Satisfied Client February 2017
text:
AnnuityAdvantage has helped me purchase two deferred annuities and we are presently at the final stage of securing a third deferred annuity, this last one using IRA money to fund the premium, all over a period of roughly five weeks and via the same representative.
Having previously worked with another firm to purchase annuities, without mishap, I came into the relationship with AnnuityAdvantage with a basic understanding of the product and process. Without being pushy and with concise guidance, AnnuityAdvantage moved as quickly as I think is possible to send me sample policy wording, answer questions, complete the application and then forward the policy packets and policy-receipt acknowledgements to me.
In one instance, the representative, upon inquiring about the insurer's upcoming rate change at a time when the insurer had already received my check but hadn't yet issued a policy, learned that the rate was going to be increased in four days and quickly advised me that I could request (if I did so that day) the insurer, via the representative, to hold the check until the effective date of the new rate, which I did and which increased guaranty-period interest by $745.
I came to learn of AnnuityAdvantage through their website, which lists the many insurer offerings of deferred annuities ranging between 3-year and 10-year guaranty periods.
